ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bravura Nerf HIT
ygData.msgSnippet: A round in 6 seconds, smae as a tick basically.  Claw can strike 3 times in a round.  A weapon strikes every (weapon delay/10) seconds.  Rounds are actually
ygData.messageBody:
A round in 6 seconds, smae as a tick basically. Claw can strike 3 times in
a round. A weapon strikes every (weapon delay/10) seconds. Rounds are
actually variable but most people refer to the 6 second refresh cycle as a
round.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Bill Costlow [mailto:atlatyl@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 18, 2000 11:53 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bravura Nerf HIT


Are enchanter charm spells actually more effective
than bard charm songs? ...at least so far?

Also, on song ticks and damage...how many ticks are in
a combat round?

for example my thulian claw is damage 5 with a 19
delay...as I understand it, that delay should allow me
to strike five times in a round ... how does this
translate into ticks?

Somebody please set me straight

Tyunes of Rodcet Nife



--- kim@... wrote:
> OTOH, if they keep them the same level and
> reserve the
> L55-60 spectrum for god/dragon-level mobs, then it
> makes sense
> (and likewise enchanters will never get a charm
> that'll work
> on L55).
